result.eng: The secret service is operating in many countries.
result.ga: tá an tseirbhís rúnda ag gníomhú in an-chuid tíortha
result.orig: tá an tseirbhís rúnda ag gníomhú in an-chuid tíortha

result.ponchtml: tá an tseirḃís rúnda ag gníoṁú in an-ċuid tíorṫaThe secret service is operating in many countries.

result.eng: Both countries still have American troops in them, ten years later.
result.ga: tá trúpaí mheiriceá sa dá thír sin fós deich mbliana anonn
result.orig: tá trúpaí mheiriceá sa dá thír sin fós deich mbliana anonn
result.html: tá trúpaí mheiriceá sa dá thír sin fós deich mbliana anonnBoth countries still have American troops in them, ten years later.
result.ponchtml: tá trúpaí ṁeiriceá sa dá ṫír sin fós deiċ mbliana anonnBoth countries still have American troops in them, ten years later.

result.eng: To wage war against the whole world, especially against countries that had oil.
result.ga: cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór go háirithe ar thíortha a raibh ola acu
result.orig: cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór go háirithe ar thíortha a raibh ola acu
result.html: cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór go háirithe ar thíortha a raibh ola acuTo wage war against the whole world, especially against countries that had oil.
result.ponchtml: cogaḋ a ḟearaḋ ar an doṁan mór go háiriṫe ar ṫíorṫa a raiḃ ola acuTo wage war against the whole world, especially against countries that had oil.
